startPage__about-course: Current project managment application is the final task of the Angular course from RSSchool. You can find more about it
startPage__about-header: Project managment application helps to keep track on your project tasks
startPage__about-description: With help of project managment application you can collaborate, manage projects and reach new productivity peaks. The way your team works can certainly be changed into a better one.
startPage__teamwork-header: Itâ€™s more than work. Itâ€™s a way of working together.
startPage__teamwork-description: Start with a creating a board, lists, and cards. Customize and expand with more features as your teamwork grows. Manage projects, organize tasks, and build team spiritâ€”all in one place.
startPage__board-header: The board is just the beginning
startPage__board-description: Lists and cards are the building blocks of organizing work on a Board. Grow from there with task assignments, timelines, and more.
startPage__card-description: Cards are your portal to more organized workâ€”where every single part of your task can be managed, tracked, and shared with teammates.
startPage__team-description_wixhub: Organized and managed all the work processes and documentation. Set up the project structure and routing system. Fixed many task issues. Made code review.
startPage__team-description_valentine909: Made a significant amount of work by setting up server-side communication and authorization logic. Made code review.
startPage__team-description_ts-andrey: Set up original style system in the app. Responsible for the welcoming page as well as for a part of the client-side logic. Made code review.
